law.catch_line: Governing bodies of state educational institutions may erect buildings.
law.text: The governing body of any state educational institution may, under the provisions of KRS 162.350 to 162.380, erect buildings and appurtenances to be used in connection with the institution for educational purposes.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. V, sec. 575, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4535m-1.
